headline: flowtrackd: DDoS Protection with Unidirectional TCP Flow Tracking
keywords: DDoS, Security, TCP, Magic Transit, Gatebot
description: flowtrackd is a software-defined DDoS protection system that significantly improves our ability to automatically detect and mitigate even the most complex TCP-based DDoS attacks. If you are a Magic Transit customer, this feature will be enabled by default at no additional cost on July 29, 2020.
